OpenSim::Constant

Constant Class Reference

#include <Constant.h>

Inheritance diagram for Constant:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class for representing a constant value.

This class inherits from Function and so can be used as input to any class requiring an rdFuction as input.

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
